ygData.subject: Re: The Dark Avian and the battle commencing.
ygData.msgSnippet: Apeface looked on, and actually gulped in worry, and quickly scuttled out when given permission. Yeah lord Havotron, as you wish. He didnt want to stick

From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Apeface looked on, and actually gulped in worry, and quickly scuttled
out when given permission. "Yeah lord Havotron, as you wish."

He didnt want to stick around for Havotron to change his mind. He
transformed into Apemode, and quickly made his way to the door, bounding
on all fours, as Spasma held onto his back. Once at the exit, he dove
out, and transformed into his jet mode, Spasma landing in the cockpit.
His engine roared to life as he blasted off.
